name: Amazon Attacked!! (volume 2)
description: (regular price $10) At long last, you too can own Gastrophobia's second collection, a 96-page book printed in luxurious black and orange ink. Vertically shorter than the first book, but with the same width so that it still looks good on the bookshelf next to it, this volume includes the second season of Gastrophobia, including 6 stories, the "how to draw" feature, 39 gag strips, and character bios in the back. All your dreams will come true as long as your dreams solely involve reading this book! Why wouldn't you act on this right away? You're not CHICKEN, are you? The Artist Edition comes signed with a sketch for only $5 extra!

name: The 12 Labours of Gastrophobia (volume 1)
description: (regular price $12) 12 LABOURS! 12 CHAPTERS! ------->$12.00! This is your chance to own Gastrophobia's first collection, a 160-page book printed in glorious black and orange ink. This digest-sized tome includes the first year and a half of Gastrophobia, 24 gag strips, and a detailed index in back. Just imagine how impressed your easily-impressed friends will be when you tell them each chapter is based loosely on one of the 12 labours of Herakles! Can you afford NOT to buy this baby? The Artist Edition comes signed with a sketch for only $5 extra!

name: Trivia 4-2-3 Tote Bag
description: (regular price $15) "What walks on 4 legs at dawn, 2 legs at noon, and 3 legs in the evening?" The contents of this heavy-duty cotton canvas tote bag are a mystery to me. Does it contain groceries? Books? Gym shoes? Only you know the answer to this eternal riddle. Featuring Trivia the Sphinx, who asks this riddle again, and again, and again, hoping some day to find someone who doesn't know the answer.

name: Phobia Keychain
description: (regular price $10) Tired of carrying all of your keys loose in your pocket? Sick of spilling your dozens of keys everywhere when you have to unlock your door, start your car, check your mail, or engage in other key-related activities? Does the mere sight of your pile of unorganized keys infuriate you? We at Gastrophobia have a solution. This 2" metal keychain features Phobia and comes with a key ring for easy key storage.

name: BUTTONS & MAGNETS!
description: You like 1" buttons, don't you? Sure! We all do! Buy a set of 4 for only $5 and live the dream. The dream of buttons! The main cast pack comes with Phobia, Gastro, Klepto, and a glow-in-the-dark turtle. Price: $5.00 The cuckoo pack comes with four cuckoo bird themed buttons: General Ornitho representing Honor, Princess Mim representing Glory, a bird on a branch, and a metalic cuckoo king! Price: $5.00 The coin pack comes with FIVE buttons with designs influenced by actual ancient Greek coins: Gastro riding a dolphin, Phobia's profile, the Cuckoo King, a pony, and a 24k gold Krphxyzwlps face! Price: $7.00 * I can convert your buttons into magnets for an extra $1.00! ** If you buy multiple packs together, you save on shipping!
